Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli

Class UICell

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli.UICell
public class UICell
extends java.lang.Object
A class that represent a cell on the board. Each cell has towerHeight which represent the height of the tower on it (0 = no tower, 3 = full height). A tower can be completed by setting dome equals to true. Each cell also has a reference to its potentially assigned worker, which may be null if there isn't any worker on it.

  • Method Details

    • getTowerHeight

      public int getTowerHeight()
      Get the tower height on this cell.
      Returns:
      the height of the tower

    • incrementTowerHeight

      public void incrementTowerHeight()
      Increase the height of the tower by 1.

    • decrementTowerHeight

      public void decrementTowerHeight()
      Decrease the height of the tower by 1.

    • hasDome

      public boolean hasDome()
      Check whether the tower has a dome on it.
      Returns:
      true if there's a dome, false if there is not one

    • setDome

      public void setDome​(boolean dome)
      Pass a boolean to mark this cell tower as completed or not.
      Parameters:
      dome - whether the tower is completed or not

    • getWorker

      public UIWorker getWorker()
      Get the worker assigned to this cell.
      Returns:
      the worker (null if there's no worker)

    • hasWorker

      public boolean hasWorker()
      Check whether there's a worker assigned to this cell.
      Returns:
      false if there's no worker, true if there is one.

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(UIWorker worker)
      Assign a player's worker to this cell.
      Parameters:
      worker - a reference to a player's worker.

    • unsetWorker

      public void unsetWorker()
      Remove a player's worker from this cell. This equals to removing a piece from the board such as during a move, but not as in "removing" the piece from the match.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Returns:
      X coordinate of the Cell

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Returns:
      Y coordinate of the Cell

    • getPoint

      public Point getPoint()
      Returns:
      a Point where the cell is situated
